techmeme.title: Analysis: Elon Musk posted about Trump's cabinet picks 70+ times from November 7 to 20 to promote his preferred candidates; Trump picked others in several cases (Reuters)
US police are testing Axon's Draft One, an AI tool that generates police reports directly from Axon's bodycam audio, with 75 officers in Colorado and elsewhere (Barbara Booth/CNBC)
A look at the UK's planned Digital Markets Unit, which will regulate US tech companies under the DMCC, passed in May 2024, and have the power to halt any M&A (Ashley Rindsberg/Pirate Wires)
Sources: Guangzhou-based self-driving company Pony.AI raised $260M after pricing its US IPO at $13 per share, the top of the range, implying a ~$4.5B valuation (Bloomberg)
Sources: Elon Musk's xAI plans to debut a consumer app as soon as December; the startup built its Colossus data center, which uses 100K Nvidia GPUs, in 122 days (Wall Street Journal)
